Do you love meaningful conversations? Here’s your chance to win ₹8,000 just by having amazing discussions with your friends on the Baithak app!

**💡 What’s the Challenge?**
 1️⃣** Step 1:** Download the Baithak App (available on the Play Store).
 2️⃣** Step 2:** Start your first Baithak with 3-4 friends on a topic of your choice.
Your first Baithak will be used for selection (minimum duration: 25 minutes).
 3️⃣ **Step 3:** If selected, you’ll need to create 20 Baithaks in a month to claim the prize!
Each Baithak must be 25 minutes or longer.
You’ll earn ₹400 per Baithak (total ₹8,000 for 20 Baithaks).

**🚀 How to Participate?**
Post the link or screenshot of your first Baithak in this group as proof of participation.
Selected participants will be notified and can start earning ₹100 for each subsequent Baithak.

**🔥 Why Join?**
Get paid for meaningful conversations with your friends!
Build your community and become a Baithak pro.

**🌟 Download the app now and start your Baithak journey!**
 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=live.baithak.app&pcampaignid=web_share

Your Guide to Creating Baithaks and Building Connections on Baithak
